data.name: Botty: Paper tales
data.detailed_description:
Steam Exclusive Offer






Check my other games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/725780/Play_With_Me_Escape_room/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1363850/THE_IMPOSSIBLE/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1430120/Moving_Letters/


And check this...

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1340050/Hand_Shadow/


About the Game

Story

Botty: Paper tales is an atmospheric adventure made entirely of paper. Botty's little robot faces a different illusion to get out of the paper world.


Game features

  • The unique experience of Point & Click adventure,
  • The game is entirely made of paper crafts to get the most reliable, fantastic world possible,
  • Atmospheric, captivating music
  • Puzzles are part of the paper world,
  • The story is told through animation and sounds, without dialogues.

About game

The game was created by one person and is inspired by old classic games such as Play with Me: Escape room, The Neverhood, Machinarium, Samorost Botanicula, Play with Me 2: On the other side and fascination with illusions.


PS. I can't tell you more.

data.short_description: Botty: Paper tales is an atmospheric adventure made entirely of paper. Botty's little robot faces a different illusion to get out of the paper world.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Greek, Korean, Polish*, Portuguese, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Japanese, Norwegian, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 32/64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1,66 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7500G/Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported all resolution 21:9 etc. (uses AiremScale technologies)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8.5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7500G/Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported all resolution 21:9 etc. (uses AiremScale technologies)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 32/64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1,66 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7500G/Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Additional Notes: Tested on Ubuntu, supported all resolution 21:9 etc. (uses AiremScale technologies)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS High Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1.7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
